About shinyFlakes™

What is shinyFlakes™


shinyFlakes™ is a purified, recrystallized orthoboric polymorph designed for superior performance.


What sets shinyFlakes apart?


Its vastly larger surface area, increased exponentialy by the micro inclusions that deliver a lustrious pearlescent shimmer, make its highly efficient, be it for domestic or industrial proccesses, Its low density and high volume mean that a little goes a long way, making it an economical choice for both personal and industrial applications.

The lightweight, waxy texture of shinyFlakes™ ensures excellent adhesion and effectiveness, outperforming traditional powdered versions. Whether you're using it for industrial applications, crafting, or household needs, shinyFlakes™ provides a reliable and efficient solution.

Choose shinyFlakes™ for its unique properties and experience the difference that quality makes. Upgrade your projects and processes today!
